alert.note: Alert for Eddy (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 30 at 10:48PM MDT until September 30 at 11:45PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Eddy County in southeastern New Mexico... * Until 1145 PM MDT. * At 1047 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Artesia, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Artesia, Atoka, Lea County Zip Franklin Memorial Airport, Loco Hills, Dayton, and Artesia Municipal Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
